Title: The Wheel
Plot: As Thanksgiving approaches, Don's work responsibilities interfere with his domestic life. Peggy is given a new opportunity, provoking the ire of some of her colleagues. Betty makes a startling discovery.
GuestStars: Bryan Batt, Anne Dudek, Katherine Boecher, Mark Moses, Joe O'Connor, Sheila Shaw, Andy Umberger, Aaron Hart, Deborah Lacey, Lisa Grady, Ross Mackenzie, Marten Holden Weiner
